message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9,000. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $7,500 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not able to go that low.  My product is truly valuable, and I'm confident it will be worth every penny for you.  How about we meet in the middle at $8,250? That gives you a good deal, and allows me to make a fair profit. Let's close this deal!
